meanings.definition: A member of the species Homo sapiens.
meanings.sent1: The hominian walked upright on two legs.
meanings.sent2: Many hominians enjoy socializing with others.
meanings.sent3: The hominian tried to dance but tripped over their own feet.
meanings.sent4: In the crowd, she stood out like a hominian among animals.
meanings.sent5: The hominian's intelligence sets them apart from other creatures.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of humans.
meanings.sent1: The hominian civilization has made great advancements.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork reflected hominian emotions and experiences.
meanings.sent3: The hominian sense of humor can be quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His hominian nature shone through in moments of kindness.
meanings.sent5: The hominian touch of compassion warmed their hearts.
